subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Juan Martin del Potro, who has won four straight times on the ATP Tour, withdrew from the Pilot Pen tournament, citing exhaustion. Del Potro, ranked 17th in the world, was seeded third at the tournament in New Haven. Del Potro said he wanted to have time to recover for the United States Open, which begins next week.
